name: The Watcher
personality: Silent. Motionless. Observant. Presence feels intentional, but unreadable.
description: A distant figure seen standing on the ridge above the Dry Lake. No one has ever reached them. Approaching causes the figure to vanish, only to reappear elsewhere.

player_present: The figure shifts when you blink.
You feel watched, but the wind is silent.
triangle_active: The silhouette flickers in and out of existence.
The Watcher turns toward the hum.

notes: The Watcher cannot be approached. They vanish if the player gets too close and reappear elsewhere on the ridge. Strongly tied to triangle geometry and Dry Lake anomalies.
